property.name: Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Move existing fighters to new carriers
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
notes
property.value:
This is a fictional scenario based on the Big World : 1942 map.
In Europe, Lithuania is compelled to end its pacifism as the Kazakh hordes and Greenlander fleets bring destruction.
The Algerians stand ready to counter these threats to their north as a new foe emerges from the south.
The Indonesians hold on China and the South Pacific is in danger as the Hawaiians move to fulfill their territorial ambitions.
Every nation has a unique unit or two.

Standard TripleA 'WW2V2' + 'LHTR' bomber rules apply. However, there are also variant rules to consider.
Also 'LHTR' delayed tech activation is applied.

Capitols

The capitols of the world powers are as follows:
Lithuanians - Baltic States
Greenlanders - Greenland
Algerians - Algeria
Kazakhs - Kazakh
Hawaiians - Hawaiian Islands
Indonesians - Java


Victory Conditions:
Until Surrender, or
Total Victory: 17 victory cities
Honorable Surrender: 15 victory cities
Projection of Power: 14 victory cities
